# Weapon Pricing by Bonus (Table)
## Overview
**Weapon Pricing by Bonus**


| **WEAPON BONUS** | **BASE PRICE <sup>1</sup>** |
|---|---|
| +1 | 2,000 gp |
| +2 | 8,000 gp |
| +3 | 18,000 gp |
| +4 | 32,000 gp |
| +5 | 50,000 gp |
| +6 <sup>2</sup> | 72,000 gp |
| +7 <sup>2</sup> | 98,000 gp |
| +8 <sup>2</sup> | 128,000 gp |
| +9 <sup>2</sup> | 162,000 gp |
| +10 <sup>2</sup> | 200,000 gp |

  1 For ammunition, this price is for 50 arrows, bolts, bullets, or firearm ammunition.

  2 A weapon canâ€™t have an enhancement bonus higher than +5.

  Use these lines to determine price when special ability are added in.
